about_the_game:
(1) What kind of work is this (free adventure setting)

is an RPG game that also helps players learn English. Players can either complete quests through pure adventure or quickly level up by learning English words to save the world. The two can be mutually exclusive or complementary.

(2) Game Features - Adventure and Learning:

This is a free and open-ended RPG adventure game. You can adventure if you want, and you can learn if you want.This is also a game with interesting story content and touching drama.Of course, this must be a game full of beautiful girls and boys.

(3) The Original Intention of the Game - Learning is not for exams, but for experiencing a wider world:

Everyone has experienced and tasted the boredom and lack of interest of learning for exams. In fact, the motivation for learning can be different. It can be for chasing stars, for traveling, or for playing games. Only by learning autonomously in a relaxed, stress-free environment can we achieve good results. Whether you are a high school student or a working professional, this is definitely one of the best tools to "improve your English vocabulary", and it is also a good game worth collecting for a lifetime.

(4) What will you gain after finishing the game:

You will have fun playing the game.

In the 10000+ word series game, you will be familiar with another 1200 words.

Each series has 95% non-repeating words. If you have a vocabulary of 8000+ words, it is equivalent to the fourth level of professional English (TEM-4), the intermediate level of the General English Proficiency Test (GEPT) in Taiwan, the International English Language Testing System (IELTS) and the Test of English as a Foreign Language (TOEFL). You can step into the threshold of high scores.

content_descriptors.notes: During the game, after using certain items, there will be clothed nudity pictures (you can choose either male or female), accompanied by some storyline describing non-consensual sexual acts and portraying them in a positive legal context.
